description: Returns the board at a given position as a struct.
Transform clocks (of one player) into move times, given the clock times and increment.
Returns eval if it is a centipawn evaluation, NULL if mate.
Returns moves to mate if eval is mate, NULL if centipawn evaluation.
Returns the FEN at a given position.
Returns true if any position matches a given sub-FEN.
Returns a list of details for all moves in the game.
Returns the details of a given move in the game.
Returns the moved pieces in order as a string.
Returns the moved pieces in order as a list.
Returns the piece counts at a given position.
Returns the squares where the pieces are at a given position.
Recompresses a game at a given compression level.
Returns true if a game matches a Scoutfish query.
Returns the list of plies matching a Scoutfish query.
Returns the Lichess time control name for given initial time and increment.
Represents the game as a PGN string.
Represents the game as a UCI string.
Converts an evaluation to winning chances using the Lichess formula.
Apply eval_to_centipawns to all items in a list.
Apply eval_to_mate to all items in a list.
Apply winning_chances_lichess to all items in a list.
